title: Best of The Program | 12/3/20
description:
Pat and Stu fill in for Glenn. The mayor of Austin joins the list of Democrat COVID hypocrites, which has gotten so bad that even CNN called them out. Should the U.S. have branded mask-wearing as patriotic from the start? Callers give their thoughts on the coronavirus. Will the debate over net neutrality make a comeback?
